text: Point Pleasant is a city located in West Virginia, United States. == Geography == The city is at the confluence of the Ohio and Kanawha Rivers. == History == Point Pleasant was the place in the Battle of Point Pleasant that took place in October 10, 1774. == In culture == The city became popular after Mothman (according to witnesses) appeared. This local legend turned into a book and 2002 movie. Category:Cities in West Virginia Category:County seats in West Virginia
title: Point Pleasant, West Virginia
